features: 10 Morandi and Candy Combination:The cute highlighters are designed with two color series,Morandi and Candy,the former won't distract you from studying or working and relax your eyes,the latter that vibrant colors won't obscure the key points you need to focus on your text.

Quick Dry & No Bleed:These bible highlighters are made with soft chisel tips for smooth writing without paper breakage.The ink is water-based and ensures fast drying.Don't worry about the ink getting your hands or sleeves dirty.
Easy to Hold:Our highlighter is designed with square shape,it’s comfortable and easy to grip without a sore hand, and square pen body makes it non-rolling, not easy to roll off the table.

Smooth Writing Experience:Cute highlighters are perfect for highlighting your scriptures, notes, journals, or any books you want to read. Free-flowing ink with a soft chisel tip lets you write everything smoothly.

Multi- Applications & Great Gift:The highlighters package is a great choice for school supplies or office supplies,also suitable for college, home, office, even travel diary, schedule, work, study, notes, etc. These aesthetic highlighters are also wonderful gifts for teachers, classmates, bosses, coworkers and so on.
body.description: Mild and Bright Color 10 different colors of aesthetic cute highlighters,5 mild colors protect your eyes from irritation and distraction,5 bright colors won't obscure the key points. Quick Drying and No Bleeding The ink of these aesthetic pens is water based, dries quickly, so you don't need to wait for a long time, no need to worry that the ink would make your hands and sleeves dirty.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Mild and Bright Color 10 different colors of aesthetic cute highlighters,5 mild colors protect your eyes from irritation and distraction,5 bright colors won't obscure the key points. Quick Drying and No Bleeding The ink of these aesthetic pens is water based, dries quickly, so you don't need to wait for a long time, no need to worry that the ink would make your hands and sleeves dirty. Type: Highlighter Point Type: Chisel Ink: Water-based Number of Pieces: 10

Smooth Writing The aesthetic highlighters are designed with Square Shape ,easy to hold and the free-flowing ink with a soft chisel tip allow you to write something smoothly for the handwriting, notes, journal and so on. No Bleed The ink of cute highlighters is water-based so that it can dry quickly.It won't bleed through pages under proper use unless you're using very thin papers or pressing highlighters very hard while using. Not Easy to Lose There are a protruding design at the end in the pastel highlighters,which makes cap placed on it.You don't have to worry about losing the cap.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I was looking for not so basic colors for work and this was exactly what I was looking for. The colors are nice. I did want to note for those that need them to not bleed that the brighter colors did bleed as you can see in my photos. I like the size, compact and easy to carry around without taking up too much space.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These are great markers for my daily bible..they don’t bleed..I would buy these again..

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great price - cute product
reviews.reviewText: I have no idea how long these will last - but I like the color and all the highlighters were “wet” as in full of product and the colors themselves are pretty bright and they all look aesthetically pleasing. THESE WERE NOT BLEED PROOF - they didn’t bleed onto the next page but they did bleed through to the back of the initial page - I hope that makes sense. Definitely a solid pick for the price. If they last a long enough time I’m sure I can see myself ordering again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These make me feel so good when I use them. They are so cute and great colors. I use highlighters often with my work. These are the perfect not too in your face bright but just enough to do its job and still look professional and beautiful at the same time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These honestly are one of the best highlighters I’ve ever used. I even colored a wooden llama with them and they looked amazing. No drying out in the middle. Colors are great. Very happy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute colors, good value
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for a gift for a co-worker for the holidays. I was pleasantly surprised with how affordable these were. They are pretty small and thin but the colors are vey aesthetically pleasing and not overly bright/neon.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars They bleed through the paper.
reviews.reviewText: I bought these for my notes and review studies, hoping they won’t bleed thru the paper. Some colors are fine and they don’t bleed thru, but they’re also faint in color. A majority bleeds thru, as seen on the picture.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great highlighters! They don’t bleed threw my planner pages and I love that some are super lightly pigmented while others are super bright
